pageContext.claim: “They tax our cars very heavily and really don't want them. They really have a barrier, and yet we take in Mercedes we take and BMWs by the millions. And it's not fair, it's not fair and we charge them almost nothing.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has this completely wrong. The BMW factory in Spartanburg, S.C. is BMW’s largest facility in the world. So many are made there that no other automaker exports more cars from the US — not Ford, not GM, not Chrysler. Mercedes also has factories in the United States.
